channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fix this pothole!!, 9th April
item.description:
Still waiting for you to fix this pothole. Beyond a joke now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 9th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please lift an relay x1 rocking 750x600x20mm best out of hours number 1 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded white lines on all areas of A40 Elmbridge court roundabout, 9th April
item.description:
White markings are faded- non-visible in the rain. Makes it extremely difficult for drivers and there are numerous accidents and near misses on this roundabout, obviously not aided by the lack of suitable white line markings. Already contacted Gloucester highways who have advised this road (being A40) falls under national highways responsibility. Please advise what will be done, thank you for your help.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Bozard lane - by new solar farm, 9th April
item.description:
The roadside has been significantly damaged by vehicles involved in the construction of the solar farm. The developer should be made to 'make-good' the damage it has caused
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 9th April
item.description:
